forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with bright sunshine by the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low near 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 42F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening changing to all rain later at night. Low 1C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. The rain and snow will change to all rain overnight. Low around 35F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 6C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 44F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening. The rain and snow will change to rain showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the overnight hours. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change evening snow showers to rain showers by daybreak. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
